title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Multimodal Learning Strategies for Integrated Representation: Consistent

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational social science theories and research methodologies
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can accurately interconnect given social phenomenon data with text and visual materials (graphs/charts) at an 80% accuracy rate.
Learners can identify references between multiple representations with over 70% accuracy using attention-guiding strategies (highlighting/color coding).
Learners can incorporate consistent interpretations between text and visual materials into integrated worksheets, reflecting peer feedback at least three times.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
